Specialized arsenal - 60 cards Technical collection of 60 cards for advanced campaigns: explosives, futuristic weapons and artisan tools. Contents:\n- 21 explosives : bombs, grenades, dynamite, modern and futuristic charges\n- 37 tools : crafting, alchemy, lockpicking, navigation\n- 2 rule cards : explosion and crafting mechanics\nFor adventurers who love creative solutions!
